The announcement of the departure of Neymar causes a shock wave in the players of Barça. The transfer of the star should be formalized on July 30, at the end of the American tour.

In Catalonia, the departure of the Brazilian star is almost beyond doubt. According to local media, the transfer will be formalized on July 30, at the end of the US tour of Lionel Messi's team. Inside the club, the tension is palpable for several days. If FC Barcelona president Josep María Bartomeu said he was "very quiet" on Wednesday, and coach Ernesto Valverde said on Friday that it was "only rumors", the reality is quite different .

And the press as the socios have understood. Thursday, the daily "Sport" said that in Barça, "recognized a problem". In the wake of this, two well-informed radio stations, Catalunya Radio and Rac 1, argued that only an "unlikely" turnaround could now prevent Neymar from leaving.
 
Barça players shocked
 
Barça players are in shock: Luis Suarez and Lionel Messi are doing everything to keep their friend. A mission a priori impossible because, in his mind, the Brazilian is already in Paris. On Friday, Argentinian international Javier Mascherano tried to reassure the fans, but did not really succeed: "Neymar is really happy in Barcelona, ​​he embodies the future of the club and we hope to be able to count on him. But every player makes his own decisions. "
 
Sunday night in New York, the Barça disputes a friendly against Juventus Turin. If Neymar does not play, it will be a clear sign of the resignation of his leaders.
